website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable, spacious, and barely noticeable, this money belt is the best on the market.
pros: Comfortable satin lining and silk exterior
cons: Zippers and buckles are plastic, not metal
Some breathability issues in hot weather

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this on right now under my shirt, fits very smooth and I can hardly tell it's there. No problem going to bathroom whatsoever. So comfortable, you can tell it's silk. I got the pink which is gorgeous. I have a passport, all my 3 brands of foreign currency, my credit cards, and I plan to sleep in it on the plane - can't imagine it will be anything but perfect. Also going to put IPhone 6 there as I go about my day in Prague. A very good product for a woman for traveling solo. Will put my mind at ease if I sleep on plane or as I enjoy my vacation
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Gunter

customer_reviews.title: Bottom ripped out in first trip using it
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to find this travel money belt. I loved the two pockets, the lightweight fabric and the comfort when wearing it. I wanted something to conveniently and safely hold my cash, cards and passport and this fit all three easily. What I didn't expect was for the seam in the bottom pocket to fall apart on my first trip using it. Thankfully I didn't have anything in that pocket at the time or else it could have fallen out as easily as the business card shown in my picture. I'll sew it to repair the seam but definitely am annoyed that I have to go to the trouble so soon after buying it.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Were it not for the plastic buckles
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could say more than it's okay. Bought two, one for myself and one for my wife, for a two-week vacation. The pocket arrangement is great, the silk really does make these less sweaty and more comfortable than most -- but unfortunately, they suffer from the bane of modern existence: plastic buckles. One of the belts was useless halfway into the trip because the stupid thin plastic buckle broke.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Arconti

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Boob Sweat Money
customer_reviews.text: Super light and easy to conceal. Can be sweaty. Will fit bills and coins and small items. Not for passports or phones.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Wore for 3 weeks straight
customer_reviews.text: I had never worn a money belt before, but I found this one to be very comfortable. The silk is very comfortable against the skin and sweat was minimal even when I was doing athletic activities. It was large enough to fit my passport and I used all of the smaller pockets to divide up my different credit cards and cash. I didn't have a problem with the clasp or zippers. If you are wearing normal (not skin-tight) clothes, this belt is completely invisible.
customer_reviews.author: WT58

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Clasp Broke on 2nd Day of Use
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product until the cheap clasp broke during the second day of use in Venice, Italy. I hope I can get an exchange or have Eagle Creek provide a new clasp 😩
customer_reviews.author: James L Perry

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very slim design.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very slim design. The fabric feels amazing. Fits passport, cards and phone. I didn't use it yet for my travels to Europe. Walked around with it at home with passport and cards. Sitting with the belt on is not a problem. You don't feel it is there. I felt carrying the belt a little bit more on the left side was the best spot for me. Because this belt has no built in RFID, I use slim RFID blocking sleeves from Alpine Rivers to protect my pasport and cards. It comes in a package with sleeves for passports (4) and CC (12). Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: sunshine-state

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: I used the belt underneath my turtleneck shirt and had to occasionally check to make sure it was there. It was so smooth and unnoticeable! Have put it away for the next trip for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: EML

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: The belt is not stretch so has limited expansion. We went back to Rick Steve’s silk money belts which are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfortable, Two Zippered Pockets, & Excellent Strap
customer_reviews.text: I used this in Barcelona and in airports. Very light, very soft and smooth, great compartments, excellent straps and snap is easy to clip. So you can take it on and off fast and easy. It was hot and humid in Barcelona (June 30-July 3), and this worked great. I sweated a bit, but even my light shirt made with sweat in that weather. Everything inside stayed dry. I was a bit paranoid about pickpockets due to all the talk, but with this I felt fine. It held my phone, money, apartment keys, and a card or two. Use it and forget about pickpockets.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Longo

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to hide in your shorts at the waistline
customer_reviews.text: I've used this money belt for all of my backpacking trips during the past four years, and it's still going strong. The price always seemed a bit high for this small thing, but it's held up well. It's easy to hide in your shorts at the waistline. It can fit a passport, credit cards, smart phones, etc. Though, if you pack in too much stuff, it kind of defeats the purpose. I usually keep the bare essentials (passport and emergency credit card) for getting home in the event I were to lose everything else. It's an all-around solid choice for backpackers. Though, Aussies and Brits will laugh at your glorified American fanny pack, so maybe don't show them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Money belt is more secure, neck wallet is secure and more convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it claims: Hide money around your waist. BUT: It's a bit of effort to get money, passports, etcetera in and out. I took this (in black) and a neck wallet (in rose, almost flesh tone) on a trip to Europe. I wore both for a while. Later in the trip when I decided Spain wasn't so dangerous, I dropped back to just the neck wallet. The waist money belt is more secure, for sure. The neck wallet felt secure enough. This costs more than some money belts. Our son bought a $7 belt and the band on that broke in 3-4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: W. Howard

customer_reviews.title: I like it better than my heavier nylon pouch which I ...
customer_reviews.text: I both wore this and stuffed it in my pocket--adaptable due to its soft material. I like it better than my heavier nylon pouch which I have had for at least 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: happy reader

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, But Not Worth the Trouble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Italy, where pickpockets are supposed to be a big problem. It does what it's supposed to do, fits comfortably around my ample, middle-aged belly, doesn't chafe when worn under my shirt. The trouble is that it's too much hassle carrying your money and credit cards under your shirt, and having partly to undress whenever you want to buy something. I wound up leaving the money belt in my room and carrying my cash and credit cards in a front pocket. A determined pickpocket could probably have gotten them there, but I didn't encounter any.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Crutchfield

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect for my cash, credit cards and passports.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my cash, credit cards and passports. I wear it around my waist so it is actually inside my jeans then when I need something I pull it up and when I'm done I tuck it back in. It is very light and I don't even notice it is there. I used it for my 6 month tour of Europe and the USA and felt much safer than if I had a wallet and passports in my jeans, purse or backpack. This is as fool proof as it gets with minimal inconvenience. There is even room for tour/concert tickets!
customer_reviews.author: T. Dore

customer_reviews.title: which makes it comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: This fanny pack/wallet is make out of lightweight and strong silk, which makes it comfortable to wear. It can be easily worn under clothes, or under a coat/jacket. It's just the right size for a small woman. It cleans easily with a light hand washing and quickly dries. There are two pockets with individual zippers. As it's black, it was sometimes confusing for me, putting something in one pocket, and then realizing it had been put into the other pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Travel money belt made me feel safer!
customer_reviews.text: I used the Undercover Money Belt to take cash on my trip to Europe. I wasn't comfortable having all my cash in my purse or carry on bag - I thought it best to split it up and carry the cash in different locations, especially since my carry on might be not be stowed close to me on the plane. I put the majority of my cash in the Undercover Money Belt. The belt was detected when I went through the airport security X-ray machine, but it wasn't a problem. It wasn't bulky or uncomfortable at all. One less thing to worry about!
customer_reviews.author: Ericksons15

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, functional, and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This belt is adjustable, comfortable, and the perfect size for carrying your passport and some money. It's not huge so don't expect to cram a ton of stuff into it; otherwise, it's great for concealing the basics while you're running around on your trip. This tucks comfortably into the back of your pants after putting it on like a belt (I suppose you could wear it in the front as well), as far as wearing something like this is concerned. As a woman, I prefer this over wearing a money belt around my neck or on my bra as those tend to look funky and feel uncomfortable and sweaty. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: very comfortably, on a five-week trip
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about this belt--wore it under my pants, very comfortably, on a five-week trip. I did pin a safety pin to the strap, in case something broke, but didn't have to use it. Posting a photo so you have an idea of what fits. I carried two credit cards, paper bills, USA passport, immunization card, visas, insurance info, etc. The photo shows my passport, some US dollars, and a boarding pass, so you can see how things fit.
customer_reviews.author: MEM

customer_reviews.title: Clasp flimsy, otherwise decently made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this money belt in Rose as a gift, but had to return it because it is indeed rose, and not beige, like another reviewer suggested (intended gift recipient is male - doubt he'd be okay with wearing something pink and silky under his clothes, but oh well). Silk feels nice but clasp is cheaply made and difficult to unclasp. Decent size/length, unlike some money belts I've used in the past that are uncomfortable due to being too long across the lap.
customer_reviews.author: Hella Bella

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Kept My Money and Cards Secure
customer_reviews.text: This money belt works well. I wore it all day under my clothes while at an amusement park. It was comfortable - I couldn't really feel it underneath my clothes. I wish it had a couple of credit card slots on the inside so that my cards were not just loose in the pouch, but it turned out to not really be an issue. I used it as a secret pouch so I never had to get in it to get anything out.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Corporate

customer_reviews.title: Worked great during our vacation
customer_reviews.text: Worked great during our vacation, but it can be a little bulky looking. If you're traveling in the summer, it won't be as easy to conceal, but we took our trip in the fall and were already padded with warm clothing, so it wasn't noticeable at all. Comfortable fit for two people around 5' 5" and 125 lbs. We had no problem keeping it secure around our tummies and under our clothing. Kept our cards and money safe, so we didn't have to worry so much about being pick pocketed and got to enjoy our trip!
customer_reviews.author: Casey H.

customer_reviews.title: Kept valuables safe while traveling
customer_reviews.text: I used this to travel out of the US recently. It was comfortable to wear due to the silk fabric and soft adjustable strap. I like the 2 zipper compartments. The clip for the strap is a little hard for me to open, but otherwise I found it very useful and secure.
customer_reviews.author: jelam

customer_reviews.title: Great to carry stuff that you don't want to take ...
customer_reviews.text: Great to carry stuff that you don't want to take in and out often. Basically best to carry your money and valuable documents. It is very hardly noticeable. But, not so good if you want to use it for something that you access while on public places. small objects like credit card may fall easily out of it, and bigger objects like paper notes are somewhat difficult to take out. I actually lost a credit card while using it. Now I just use it to carry cash which I don't use while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Seakha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my passport and cash while travelling
customer_reviews.text: After hearing about all the pickpockets in Europe, I decided that I wanted to keep my my cash, credit cards and documents in a money belt. This one was perfect. I like that the belt is elastic so it hugs my body and doesn't slip down. My US passport fit just fine and there was room for credit cards and cash. I always felt secure. I don't think a whole wallet would fit in, but maybe one of those nylon kinds would work, but it might make it too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: snapnread

customer_reviews.title: Not Deep Enough
customer_reviews.text: This money belt was very good if you don't put your passport in a cover. However, we kept our passport and credit cards in a cover that has RFID blocking. The cover would barely fit into the larger pocket of the money belt and it was difficult to zip up the pocket. I was constantly frustrated after making a purchase and having to struggle with getting my passport cover back in the money belt and zipping it up.
customer_reviews.author: Panacea

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear and safely hide valuables
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Greece 2 years ago. My sister highly recommended it for safety reasons. I liked it because it was comfortable and I felt better sightseeing since my valuables were hidden safely where pick-pockets couldn’t reach them. Now I bought one for my daughter for our upcoming trip to Italy.
customer_reviews.author: kellie marcus

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable worn on the back, uncomfortable in the front when sitting down.
customer_reviews.text: It was good and comfortable. However I say this having worn it turned to the small of my back instead of at my abdomen. It wasn't comfortable for me there while sitting. A skinning person might be able to wear it there. But wearing it turned to my back, it was very comfortable and I forgot that I even had it on. All I kept in it was my passport, but it could have still held some cards and cash and still be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pez Collector

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel - not bulky -easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews for this item I purchased for a long overseas trip. Amazed by how much I could fit inside the pouch. Many times I forgot I was wearing it..not bulky and no irritation even though the temps were over 90 degrees and I wore it daily. Easy to clean. I felt safe wearing this in Europe and in the airports. My passport and credit cards were enclosed in RFID protected cases and still fit inside along with envelopes and cash. Glad I ordered this size instead of the smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: TreeTown

customer_reviews.title: But the texture is soft and nice. The strap and its lock are secure
customer_reviews.text: We have so far made 3-4 trips with this over past couple of years. It is light invisible and reliable. Holds bills, papers and passports. Has not been irritative to my body, but I am tough. My wife says she itches when she wears it. But the texture is soft and nice. The strap and its lock are secure, and it changes size, so will fit your size no matter what. Overall, highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Picky customer

customer_reviews.title: Unobtrusive and not irritating, could use some waterproofing.
customer_reviews.text: I wore this belt during a vacation in the mediteranian. It was quite comfortable and I was able to make it unobtrusive underneath my shirt (at least until sweat made my shirt stick). The one downside was the lack of waterproofing for anything placed inside, but that might make it less comfortable as it would not breath as well as it does. During the summer months, or any time you might get a bit wet, I recommend a plastic baggie to protect the items inside.
customer_reviews.author: Caimheul

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This money belt got some fairly heavy use for three weeks in Cuba but the seams along the top started unraveling pretty quickly. That didn't keep it from working but was annoying since it was brand new. I was going to send it back but it wasn't really worth the trouble. I might have liked it more in a cooler climate. I was so hot and it was so damp most of the time, I quit wearing it and just stuck it in the pocket of my cargo pants or my backpack. That defeats the purpose of having a money belt!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this money belt for my trip to Greece, Turkey and Venice. It worked great. There is no metal so I was able to wear it thru most the security checkpoints without raising any questions. The size was just right. I could fit my passport plus plenty of room for cash. Forgot I was wearing it while walking around thru Venice all day. My wife had a smaller money belt that a friend gave her. It was too small for her passport and could not carry much cash, it was worthless. This one is big enough but not too big.
customer_reviews.author: GSHADEL

customer_reviews.title: unnecessary. I"m Past my thirty days
customer_reviews.text: trying to return this. It rolled up, was hard to access, unnecessary. I"m Past my thirty days, but ordered it before my trip ,returned and tried to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: That is a good recommendation, because of the lengths and widths of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the short belt because I thought the 19" belt was too long. That was a mistake; I actually use the 19" belt that Rick Steve's recommends. That is a good recommendation, because of the lengths and widths of currency, the size of passports and the need for a separate compartment for credit/debit/ATM cards. This short belt is more appropriate for a child or other small person who carries only concealed currency.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for intended use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 20-year old son who was traveling with his girlfriend for the first time to NYC. He made fun of me for getting it for him, and then he ended up using it for the 3 days they were there. He loved it and said it was very comfortable, not at all bulky. Based on his response, I just bought another one from Amazon for my other son who will be traveling to Paris for 10 days on his honeymoon later this month. I hope to update my review when he returns -- hopefully with additional positive comments!
customer_reviews.author: DHJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that wasn't too bulky and that I could easily hide under my clothes. I didn't want something that went around my neck because I wanted to wear necklaces and I thought it would be harder to hide anyway. This belt was just perfect! It lays very flat and has 2 zippered pockets, more than enough room for your passport, credit cards, and Euros or what ever currency you will be using. It is adjustable so it will fit anyone. The only thing I will say is that the color is more of a beige than rose but it doesn't show anyway so it doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: P. LaPlant

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the good ol' soft, barely-there silk of yesteryear, not a crinkly, thick backed, wide bulky thing! This does not lie much flatter than the plasticky waterproof ones. Disappointed! No way to conceal on a woman without thick clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A. Weygandt

customer_reviews.title: The MOST comfortable of ALL
customer_reviews.text: THE best. Others are good, this is comfy and non-irritating. On a group tour of SE Asia, we were told to bring more $$ because no ATMs (turns out that info was out of date, things a changing there FAST). But this was the way to bring it. Husband carried cash easily and the other stuff we just couldn't lose.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Drimmer

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than previous belt
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for husband who didn't use it the entire trip but when he did, it worked well. Also purchased to thwart Barcelona theft rings and we did not lose any money. Worked better than previous belt, Flatter than previous belt which makes it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne V. McKaughan

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is wayyy to small. I though I could carry more than my passport and some money and I was wrong. If you are not a minimalist person don't even bother. I don't think that even the XL version is a good fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jenniffer

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is low profile and a good size
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is low profile and a good size. Silk makes it very comfortable next to my skin. Am heading out for a backpacking trip across Europe this summer and it seems fit to the task.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my trip to Europe and wore it for 2 weeks straight. It got sweaty since the weather was near 100 degrees F, but it worked great. It is so light and silky smooth that my mother had a hard time wearing hers because she couldn't "feel" it and therefore was constantly nervous that it "fell off." I just tucked mine inside my pants so it was secure and had no issues. The fastener is heavy duty so I never worried about it falling off, but you could always secure with a safety pin if you wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Coral

customer_reviews.title: Trip Saavy!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to use this on my next trip. No more worries about important docs and money. I know it will work great. Soft and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for student travel
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son to use on a trip to Europe. It was the perfect size to hold his passport, money, and credit cards, but not much more. It was concealed under his shirt for extra protection against the pick-pocketer he encountered and since it was hidden it didn't look unappealing, which is always a concern for teenagers. My son said other students had to worry about their bags and wallets being lifted but he didn't have to worry since his important items were securely on him at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth ever dime!
customer_reviews.text: Can I just say how much I loved this money belt? It was so entirely comfortable. I wore it under my undies, and it never bothered me for even one second. Granted, I only used it to carry money, not my passport, so I don't know how comfortable that would have been. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: April Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Ain't no one gonna mug you w/ this!
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a trip to Brazil, did what it's made for---hid my reals/cards/I.D. from sneaky people. Lies flat against stomach, stays in place, easy access zipper that also did NOT get stuck (WIN!) and isn't bulky. Only downside is the fabric on the back isn't exactly great for wearing for 12+ hours in tropical heat pounding pavements in Sao Paulo. Whatever, I made it without getting mugged, so I'm happy with the product. Well done Eagle Creek.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious money belt!
customer_reviews.text: This is so soft and thin and will be so easy to wear, especially in hot climates. The color is very pretty and the silk is just beautiful. With great zippers you can't go wrong with Eagle Creek.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Helpful accessory
customer_reviews.text: I am going to Africa later this month and, because credit cards are not readily accepted, I will need to carry a larger amount of money than I feel comfortable with. This money belt will help with that and it is large enough to also carry my passport. It appears to be well made and will fit many size waists. Because I haven't used it yet, I don't know how well it will hold up but Eagle Creek products have a good reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Travellingmom

customer_reviews.title: Could use a better clip, but works really well!
customer_reviews.text: The clip for this is not the best/sturdiest and I was constantly double checking that it was ok. Despite that, it worked well for our trip and allowed me to keep money safe while still accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a recent trip to Peru. Very comfortable under a shirt and just the right size for notes, passport and credit cards. Tricky to access if you need something there and then. I had to keep my passport in my pocket since your passport is required when you use your credit card, or pretty much most of the time there. Good though for your excess valuables to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Allen D. Reinecke

customer_reviews.title: Better than neck wallet.
customer_reviews.text: This was so comfortable that I didn't remember I had it on when I went through customs! I only used it when I had to travel with all my valuables. You really can't access it in public easily without looking like your doing something odd ( just ask the people sitting next to me on the plane!) I bought a neck wallet as well but that was easily seen when wearing t-shirts so I used this more.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, soft and comfortable to use. But a bit flimsy to last more than 1 journey
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slim and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits well under clothes. Big enough for a US passport, money and credit cards. The silk is comfortable. I am a bit concerned about a simple plastic clip closure on the elastic strap. It seems flimsy and could break. Perhaps I'm neurotic, but I added a safety pin as backup just in case.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Cutler

customer_reviews.title: A must have for travelers
customer_reviews.text: So you are traveling, you've watched Rick Steve's travel details and now you too want a money belt. My husband wore this easily concealable belt under his shorts during our recent European travel and it worked well for him. Highly recommended as this could prevent pick-pocketing all of your valuable items.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy C

customer_reviews.title: good to keep a few things in there like your ...
customer_reviews.text: ive been using this for a while now on my travels abroad. good to keep a few things in there like your passport, a couple credit cards and some money. dont fill it up with too much because it starts to look bulky and noticeable under your shirt after a certain point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was not prepared for such a high quality item after reading some of the reviews. This money belt is perfect for me. I have been wearing it for a few weeks now, and I don't even know it's there. It's slim, silky, doesn't chafe or feel tight (I'm a size 10), and I almost forget to take it off at night. I use it for money (bills), credit cards, passport and very important papers. It is not visible when I wear it, but I don't stuff it to make it stick out, either. I like the color, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Nice And Small
customer_reviews.text: This holds a passport and $2,000 in twenty dollar bills. It would not hold much more and that is exactly what I wanted. I put the money in small zip lock bags to keep it from getting sweaty. It stays in place under my pants and I don't open it all day. It lays flat against my stomach and doesn't make a bulge. Very nice product and much better than the larger one I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Atlantico

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: The silk is definitely more comfortable than a man-made fabric. The color is great under lighter color clothing, as it blends with your skin color.
customer_reviews.author: Diversified Interest

customer_reviews.title: Wore this for three weeks in Europe. Comfy and ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore this for three weeks in Europe. Comfy and secure. Some wear this around their waist. I wore it at hip level below my capris and kept about $40-50 (euro) in my purse so that if anyone were watching, he/she wouldn't know where the majority of my funds were. I will use this at home when carrying any significant amount of cash also.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling! The fabric is smooth against your clothes and skin. It's large enough to fit two passports, cash and more. I like the two zippered pockets to keep passports in the bigger one and cash and credit cards in the smaller one. The silky fabric makes you forget it's there and is more comfy than other money belts especially when sitting down. *hint* save those desiccant gel "do not eat" packets and place them in your money belt to reduce moisture from sweat from making your passport/cash wet. Works well especially since I was using it in the humid Amazon jungle.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great for vacations
customer_reviews.text: I used this when we went to Europe and have no complaints. It held our 2 passports and plenty of euro's and as long as you don't wear a tight shirt it never shows. I really like that you can adjust the tightness since I like to keep it snug so I can always feel that it's there but it's not uncomfortable. It is well made and will continue to use it for vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and was comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from two weeks in hot, hot Spain, I wore this money belt everyday and it was very comfortable. In fact, most of the time I forgot that I had it on. The two zippered pouches are just the right size. One for money and one for passports and credit cards. The only downside is that my teenage son would get embarrassed every time I went to retrieve something!! ;-]
customer_reviews.author: Computer Guy

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it will suit me well for 4 months in the caribbean.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this the other day; I haven't tested it out officially yet, but I bought it for a 4 month trip in the tropics, so I'll post an update if it ends up being terrible. But for now, it seems wonderful. It's super soft and honestly, not really noticeable. I even tested it out for a few hours under a crop top, and I could only see it when I was dancing and raising my arms up repeatedly. So, for today, I am super pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Anonnymouse.

customer_reviews.title: Money Belt
customer_reviews.text: The pouch works fine but it does move around a bit. After the first few days we did not use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Cook

customer_reviews.title: Best travel item in the world, almost.
customer_reviews.text: I am in the middle of my trip to Philippines and sweet Jebus it's hot here. This is my first money belt and I was worried it would be noticeable and make me sweat. In reality, I completely forget it's on: no sweating and you cannot see it. This is probably the best travel item outside of a suitcase that I own.
customer_reviews.author: Galoolie

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: I wore this in Europe when traveling by rail because I didn't want to put important things in my bag. I put my passport, money, and cards in it. Everything fit comfortably. Sometimes I forgot it was there. Ive only used it for two weeks though, and I cant discuss its durability or how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: DocStrange

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I used this traveling around Peru the past couple of weeks. Because of it's material, it's very comfortable to wear under your clothes. You'll probably forget your wearing it. It's also discreet. I doubt anyone will know you are wearing it. The only con I have is that the belt clip is pretty flimsy, and I doubt it will age well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt K

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I am very slim 25" waist 100 pounds so this size was good for me. I did have to wear around my hips since it was very obvious around my waist unless I wore a huge loose shirt. The fabric on the back against the skin is soft and band is also stretchy and soft. I wore this for 8 days with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Usagi

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for his trip to Italy, England & France this past summer and he said he loved it because it was not to bulky and he had some where safe and secure to keep his passport and money. Just a little heads up, if you're over weight I do not recommend that you spend your money because it might not fit you. You should just get one at Target or something because that way you can try it on at the store and see if it fits.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R.

customer_reviews.title: Euro Trip
customer_reviews.text: I was all about a money belt for my euro trip. This however was not a good purchase, the cheap plastic clip broke off at my very first hostel and the item has no RFID blocking properties. I wish I had bought a different kind.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: European Tour
customer_reviews.text: My son took this on a student band tour of Europe. He used it daily to keep his money safe. It's smaller than other money belts but was perfect for him. He found that he preferred to wear it around his torso rather than his waist. When he returned I sent it through the washing machine and hung it up to dry. It washed perfectly and hopefully we will have opportunity to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: DMS

customer_reviews.title: safe, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I Ordered this money belt before a trip to Paris. It was highly advised to wear a money belt. I wore it when I had a plane flight or Eurostar train ride, other time it was in the hotel room safety. I did not feel a thing when I wore it ( the pouch would be on the side or back) even in the hot weather. It is pricey though.
customer_reviews.author: Afternoon Tea

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, soft unnoticeable and very comfortable even on long ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, soft unnoticeable and very comfortable even on long flight. Wore all around europe with no problems holds LOTS of cash and other paper.non sweat. When using with 2 passports I did notice it a bit but not too bad. the best way is to make photo copies of your passport and put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: great to keep money hidden
customer_reviews.text: I wear this when I am going somewhere that I need money and id but do not want to carry a purse. It is great. People cannot tell you are "wearing" your money. I felt secure having my cash stash hidden away and that it could not be ripped off my arm like a purse could. It is comfortable to wear and makes me feel secure.
customer_reviews.author: Davesbikerbabe

customer_reviews.title: It's small but holds necessary documents and money.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that I could hide it under my blouse or jersey.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrendous. A hole developed the second day I used this is spain. I was terrified my money would slip out. Not safe for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Peifer

customer_reviews.title: Must own if you travel overseas or go to a lot of concerts!
customer_reviews.text: This is the money belt you need to take to all major concerts and music festivals to give you peace of mind that your money and personal documents will never disappear. I wore it while I was at Ultra Europe and other major parties in Ibiza. Very comfortable and light-weight. Just be sure to not stuff it with coins because then you will be a bit uncomfortable! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LG9085

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable under clothes
customer_reviews.text: It held everything I needed it to but it was uncomfortable under my clothing. Granted, I was hiking the Inca Trail so it was a pretty strenuous activity. Might feel fine for just touristy stuff. All in all, it worked well, I just ended up wearing over my pants.
customer_reviews.author: K. C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my recent trip to Italy and couldn't get used to having something around my neck, so ended up using it as a wallet in my anti-theft purse. It's a great little item, small and lightweight, with compartments for passports, cash, and credit cards. It seems well made also and I plan to use it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Stamm family

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable and well-constructed money belt - perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction, satiny smooth silk, remarkable thin (not bulky) and comfortable. This worked great on my trip to Europe. Purchased as a precaution and carried my passport, cash and iPhone comfortably and discreetly. Perfect size and completely safe from pickpockets. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SammaLamma

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Went to Europe last summer and got this for the trip. Wasn't too hot. Kept everything safe and secure. Once I had it on could barely tell it was there. Only issue is when you need to get something out and you have to lift up your shirt in the middle of a store!
customer_reviews.author: another employee

customer_reviews.title: They improved a really good wallet to make a great one.
customer_reviews.text: I had an earlier version of this for about 10 years. This one is even better. The zipper looks better, it has nicer pulls and they add a little pouch to stuff the strap in. Overall this is an improvement on a great wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Cruizer Ed

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Quite a good little money belt. I noticed it on me, but nobody else did. As practice I went to the bars with it on and $400 in 20s in it along with a credit card, and it was never noticed throughout the night (even by my friends). Planning on taking this with me to Europe
customer_reviews.author: Trekkie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY nicely constructed with good quality materials. Attractive enough that even my wife will use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jfrank

customer_reviews.title: It made me feel very secure!
customer_reviews.text: I traveled to France and Italy in October of this year with my daughter and it was my constant companion. I was always secure in the knowledge that my cash and cards were concealed very cleverly. It is soft and smooth under your clothing, you can almost forget you are wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: So soft and form fitting. I hardly knew it was on me. Plenty of room for necessities.
customer_reviews.author: crybabyjj

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It's very low profile; even with phone, passport, money, and debit card all inside you couldn't notice it under clothing. It did cause a little extra sweating where it sat but I was also using it in Bangkok where the temperature is 100+ and the humidity is similar, so I would have been sweating regardless. The belt didn't slide down or loosen up like some others do. Definitely a great money belt, I'll be using it for as long as it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: ap1027

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I tried 3 different products. This was the best. It was comfortable to wear and I almost forgot it was even there. Only problem was the stuff inside tended to get soaked with sweat, but I was also in a very hot climate.
customer_reviews.author: Diaper Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This money belt worked well. The smaller length of the pouch fit my wife better than the other Eagle Creek Money Belt (Deluxe). I think this one would be nicer if it had a second zippered pocket. It's nice being able to keep your passport in a completely separate compartment from your cash.
customer_reviews.author: The Nerdy Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Great money belt
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my Mediterranean trip and very comfortable. I have both versions of this money belt and like them both. Secure and very comfortable, hardly notice it while wearing and never had a problem with either the silk or regular version. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, and it is not bulky
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my college son to use for his travels through South America and Europe. Has held up well, comfortable, and it is not bulky. He was very hesitant to take on his first trip thinking I was being paranoid but quickly found that it was easy to use and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The silky undercover money belt was so comfortable. When I returned home, it was washed with with other garments and is now ready for another trip. I wore the item slightly above the waistband of my skirt or slacks. It was easy to adjust the circumference and stayed in place.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoy Learning

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for European traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Work great! Use them every time we go to Europe and haven't had any issues. Comfortable enough to last all day and spacious enough to put everything that is necessary in there including passport.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: This money belt is nice and small (great for me as I'm not very ...
customer_reviews.text: This money belt is nice and small (great for me as I'm not very large). It's comfortable feels ok on my skin even after wearing it for 14+ hours. It's a good value for the money, but I do wish the quality of material was a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Clip would not snap together
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to using a money belt that woud feel nice and cool on my skin. The silk material did feel great, however the plastic clip would not snap together so the belt was useless. I took it with me anyway with the intent of using a safety pin to hold it together since I did not have time to return the item before my trip to South America. While at the airport waiting to depart I found another moneybelt for $20 and bought that one. I tossed the Eagle belt in the nearest trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful passport holder
customer_reviews.text: Discrete and convenient. Fits your passport, some money, and a few other flat items that will never be seen by anyone else. Can go around your waist or down your pant leg. Sad I lost it but I'll buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertiesed
customer_reviews.text: This money belt was perfect for my monthlong trip through Europe. It fits comfortably under my pants, over my underwear. It held cash, a few cards, and my passport with no problems. Highly recommended for anyone who wants to keep their belongings safe from pickpockets.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I would like this around my waist in such a warm climate, but it worked out great. It is very comfortable to where, I could barely tell it was on and more convenient than a wallet....not to mention safer. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: I really like this money belt
customer_reviews.text: I really like this money belt! I haven't travelled with it but I wore it around the house to make sure it would be comfortable. It gets a little warm but that is to be expected since I put it under my shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

product_meta.title: Eagle Creek Silk Undercover Travel Money Belt, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackEagle Creek Large Pack It Cube. Once you arrive, your clothes can stay organized and you'll know where everything is, giving you peace of mind and making your life a little easier. 

FEATURES: 

 * Organization. Separating your currency and your important documents with two different pockets to maintain privacy. 
 * Comfort. All day comfort with the soft silk and adjustable strap for all sizes..
 * Sweat Safe.The breathable silk and sweat-resistant lining will keep you cool while keeping your valuables dry.. 
 * Dimensions. 11.5 x 5.5 in | 2 oz. 

WHY EAGLE CREEK? 
Eagle Creek is a global tribe of travelers committed to preserving and protecting the places we live, work and travel. We’re on a mission to unlock new ways to positively impact the cultures, environments and planet for future generations to discover. We've been around for more than 40 years and we take pride in equipping you with versatile gear to take you beyond your fears and outside your comfort zone.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars200 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
